Someone intercepted three short-signed messages used to verify trades. Can you recover the original signature from the intercepted ciphertext? Here it is: 0x21a0b5cc118bc0fd8de18e86fc33074b585df061f6606d6e03299052e27feb24417419e9cf5b14a3102e940e61376f6835c031e5765df10002edcbca2efa9eae

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{2zda556r}
ciphertext: 0x21a0b5cc118bc0fd8de18e86fc33074b585df061f6606d6e03299052e27feb24417419e9cf5b14a3102e940e61376f6835c031e5765df10002edcbca2efa9eae

hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
